title: Tribunal is lame
body:
There are quite some self righteous people judging my conversation in the tribunal. I've been on an honor streak for a long time, and I just had about 3 - 4 bad games in a row where just 1 - 2 people did inexcusably bad. God forbid I tell our 0/7 Xerath who is sitting in base spamming /ff that he is garbage, and that he can't land a stun to save his life. No, I should be more careful than that, I might get chat banned for 31 games in a row.

Yeah I did it for 3-4 games, its still bullshit. How many players got into a good mood after winning 1 - 2 games in a row, and in their excitement decided to be self righteous and apologize to the opposing team for their only positive/threatening player who was a little bit mean to the other fellow feeders. And of those people I wonder how many get on the tribunal between wins (Not losses) and hit the punish button upon seeing "Teemo wtf don't flash into full health Garen noob" in chat.

I've seen a lot of tribunal horror stories before, but you know this qualifies as stupid. If a player can't handle negative feedback on his don't-try-don't-care play style then that should be his own personal problem, and shouldn't be brought to the tribunal for a bunch of unattractive introverts to skim over and punish. Who the hell decides to report someone for verbal harassment anyway? What a pussy, in my 2,000 games of LoL I've never once reported someone because I got my "feelwings" hurt.

replies.body: Wait.....  You're complaining about a system that isn't even online?  If you got punished, it was from Riot themselves.
Tribunal's been down for ages. And to be honest, harassing and haranguing players, whether unskilled or otherwise does nothing but sour up the entire affair.

Sounds to me like you are a liar sir

You're here because you are pissed off

Being pissed off is a form of "having your feewings hurt"

and since there is no "report tribunal" button you instead come to forums to create your own form of "report tribunal"

ergo : "my feewings awe huwt ant dewes *sniff* no *sniff* wepawt twibunaw buttin so i wiww wepawt dem onwhine"

sounds to me like your the self-righteous, what u might perceive as "someone not trying" might be exactly the opposite, they ARE trying; trying a new champ, or trying a new role, or trying a new build
you see it as "non-meta" so they must be messing around, when the reality is, there are many ways to learn things, some only learn fire is hot by sticking their hand into the fire, if thats the case, let em stick their hand in fire!
or when they say IDGAF its just norms, doesnt mean the way they intended it was the way you perceived it, like, why should i sweat this normal game with nothing but my fun riding on the line when i still have to go to work as soon as its done?
i get less upset about a game before work than i do afterwork, seeing as afterwork i have time and left over energy to be upset with whereas before work i know i cant bring this baggage with me, ill probly get fired for being salty, so i just dont care which is why im on norms and NOT on ranked

if its that big of a deal then open your eyes for the players you DO want to play with and friend them, start up a party everytime u go to play.
if u cant find enough players that you DO want to play with and cant start a party before gaming then you might want to look inwards as there is every type of player on every level of skill with different degrees of seriousness and competing values and you should be able to fill your friends list with similar valued players very quickly.

Good luck on the fields of Justice and remember, an eye for an eye leaves the world blind but lending a hand leaves us all with extra hands

Applies to Riot indeed, they don't want inconsiderate assholes, who can't keep their mouth shut, in their game.  And ya know what?  Don't blame them.  I have bad games too, from my screw ups or someone else ruining it, but I just suck it up and move on.  Because let's be honest here, if that one bad game sticks with you, and you remember it always, you need help.  And yes, I was on tribunal, and from checking, 100% accuracy with only 1 perma ban ever given.

Even so its still bullshit. And the self-righteous, unattractive introvert thing applies to Riot staff too. Well I'm happy to cost Riot money for the sake of my own enjoyment. Anyways, unskilled is one thing, not trying is another. As far as I'm concerned people who talk "idgaf its normals yolo 0/5/5 with least dmg dealt/tanked" don't count as real players. Yet they are always the fastest ones to hit the report button when someone doesn't like them... Interesting.
